name: CitySimulator
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: city simulator
des: Ever tried to run a city before? Let's see if you have what it takes! Starting as mayor with $10,000 in funds, grow your ciy and leave the residents happy as can be. Anything goes in this fun free form city simulation game. Give it a go! Drop us any feedback at support@stokedskills.com. We love to hear from our users!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
